short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays recent, hourly updated, coronavirus data on the New Tab Page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Replace new tab page with a recent data on cases of Covid-19. 

The New Tab Page is likely the first thing you see going onto the internet and it should keep you well informed during these uncertain times.

Corona Track takes data off a local API which is updated daily, and displays it in a easily readable format on your new tab page.
 Replaces your new tab page with recent data on the disease where you can sort the data by total cases, new confirmed cases, and a variety of other options along with being able to search for data on your specific country.
